word: H7949 - שָׁלַג - shâlag - shaw-lag' - Be as snow - பனி போல இரு

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be as snow / பனி போல இரு
(Hiphil) to snow, to be like snow
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly meaning to be white; used only as denominative from H7950; to be snow white (with the linen clothing of the slain): - be as snow.
Cognate: H7949, H7950
